blocked

public boolean blocked(org.newdawn.slick.util.pathfinding.PathFindingContext pfc,
                       int x,
                       int y)
Check if a particular location on the map is blocked. Note that the x and y parameters are floating point numbers meaning that we can be checking partially across a grid cell. Blocking objects include BLOCKs and bombs.

Specified by:
blocked in interface org.newdawn.slick.util.pathfinding.TileBasedMap
Parameters:
x - The x position to check for blocking
y - The y position to check for blocking
Returns:
True if the location is blocked
